PendingOrderSummary.name: PendingOrderSummary
PendingOrderSummary.description: Object representing a B2C Commerce order ingested via High Scale Orders before an OrderSummary is created for it. Optimized for online transaction processing (OLTP).

AccountId.description: ID of the account or person account associated with the PendingOrderSummary. It represents the shopper in the storefront.

BillToContactId.description: ID of the Contact associated with the PendingOrderSummary. It represents the shopper in the storefront when not using person accounts.

BillingEmailAddress.description: Email address on the billing address.

BillingPhoneNumber.description: Phone number of the billing address.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for orgs with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO code for the currency of the original Order associated with the PendingOrderSummary.

ExternalReferenceIdentifier.description: Used internally to prevent duplicate records. This value is case-sensitive. On creation, this value is set to B2C realm ID + "_" + B2C instance ID + "@" + B2C Commerce catalog/domain ID + "@" + B2C Commerce order number.

GrandTotalAmount.description: Total amount, including adjustments and tax, of the PendingOrderSummary.

OrderedDate.description: Date of the original order associated with this PendingOrderSummary.

ProcessingInstructions.description: Instructions about how the HSOI service should create the order summary. Options include using the default without customizations or using a custom flow.

SalesChannelId.description: ID of the SalesChannel associated with this PendingOrderSummary. The SalesChannel Name matches the B2C Commerce catalog/domain ID.

SalesStoreId.description: ID of the RetailStore or WebStore associated with this PendingOrderSummary.

ShopperName.description: The first name and last name of the shopper that placed the original order.
